TopicTitle: What version of KSP are you currently playing?

Articles.Content:
Curious to see what is going on in terms of what versions are in use.

Edited June 3, 2016 by Mrsupersonic8

I've got 1.1.2 installed, but I'm not playing right now.  I got tired of the install, wait for mods to update, install patch, wait for mods... cycle, so I've been playing something else.  It's a cycle I go through of playing and not, and 1.1 released at a low point in the cycle.

Burnt the hell out something fierce, not playing.

Which cracks me up because I just recently bought an Alienware 15 R2 to replace my work laptop (for gaming, anyway) and what do I use it for?  A six year-old game...  Someday I'll have to throw Space Engineers on and give it a go.
I've been dragging my feet with 1.0.5, waiting on 1.1.3. Still a few bugs in 1.1.2 that kind of make it a non-starter, but that'll change real soon now.
Yeah, no kidding! There are many bugs with 1.1.2. But even with those, 1.1.2 is infinitely better than 1.0.5.

1.0.5 - I'm lazy, and my friends' DMP server runs 1.0.5. Sure, I could keep another install sitting around with 1.1 (I already have 4 KSP installs listed in my CKAN install list, all 1.0.5) but again, lazy and unwilling to deal with inconsistencies in the mods available for one version vs. the other.
Not playing. Watching forum and bugtracker for progress. Not seeing any.
